bibl.title: The Late Antique Period on Sheikh Abd el-Gurna: The Monastery of Cyriacus.
bibl.note: Pp. 150-157, Nos 70-76: description [by Andrea HASZNOS] of 3 Coptic ostraca, 1 bilingual ostracon (Greek and Coptic), 2 Coptic papyrus and 1 amphora with Coptic homily text [see pp. 152-153, No. 72: Limestone ostracon with a Greek-Coptic Glossary. From TT-NN-24-Forecourt, Reg. No. 435a, Inv. No. 07/ID/06. Late Antique, AD 6th-8th centuries].

bibl.title: Hungarian Excavations in the Theban Necropolis. A Celebration of 102 Years of Fieldwork in Egypt. Catalogue for the Temporary Exhibition in the Egyptian Museum, Cairo, November 6, 2009 - January 15, 2010

bibl.seg: 142.13 / 142.4 O. Sheikh Abd el-Gurna Inv. 07/ID/06 (TT-NN-24-Forecourt, Reg. No. 435a)
BÁCS T.A., The Late Antique Period on Sheikh Abd el-Gurna: The Monastery of Cyriacus.

T.A. BÁCS, Z.I. FÁBIÁN, G. SCHREIBER and L. TÖRÖK (Edd.), Hungarian Excavations in the Theban Necropolis. A Celebration of 102 Years of Fieldwork in Egypt. Catalogue for the Temporary Exhibition in the Egyptian Museum, Cairo, November 6, 2009 - January 15, 2010 (Budapest, 2009) pp. 146-157, 15 figg. coul.

Pp. 150-157, Nos 70-76: description [by Andrea HASZNOS] of 3 Coptic ostraca, 1 bilingual ostracon (Greek and Coptic), 2 Coptic papyrus and 1 amphora with Coptic homily text [see pp. 152-153, No. 72: Limestone ostracon with a Greek-Coptic Glossary. From TT-NN-24-Forecourt, Reg. No. 435a, Inv. No. 07/ID/06. Late Antique, AD 6th-8th centuries].
